text: Forchheim (; East Franconian: Forchham) is a German town in Upper Franconia. Next bigger cities are Nürnberg, Bamberg, Fürth, Erlangen and Coburg. There live is about 32.000 people. Forchheim is high and has an area of . == Photo gallery == Forchheim-St Martin-02-2015-gje.jpg Forchheim-St Martin-08-rechtes Seitenschiff-2015-gje.jpg Forchheim-08-Rathausplatz-Brunnen-2015-gje.jpg Forchheim-20-barockes Haus-Lokal-2015-gje.jpg Forchheim-30-Salzmagazin-2015-gje.jpg Forchheim-Marienkapelle-02-2015-gje.jpg Forchheim-70-Wiesent-Fischkaesten-2015-gje.jpg Forchheim-60-Stoerche-2015-gje.jpg == References == == Other websites == * www.forchheim.de (official Webpage in German) Category:Towns in Bavaria Category:Forchheim (district)
